q_ch: 2024年5月31日前完成的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What sewing tasks will be completed before May 31, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks that will be completed before May 31, 2024. Let's take a look at the details: 🧵✨

| Task ID | End Time          | Working Group Name | Order Product ID |
|---------|-------------------|--------------------|------------------|
| 1       | 2024-02-07        | Master Sewers      | 1                |
| 2       | 2024-02-15        | Premier Sewers     | 2                |
| 3       | 2024-02-08        | Premier Sewers     | 3                |
| 4       | 2024-01-30        | Master Sewers      | 4                |
| 5       | 2024-02-25        | Master Sewers      | 5                |
| 6       | 2024-04-07        | Advanced Sewers    | 6                |
| 7       | 2024-03-22        | Advanced Sewers    | 7                |
| 8       | 2024-04-05        | Skilled Sewers     | 8                |
| 9       | 2024-03-20        | Advanced Sewers    | 9                |
| 10      | 2024-04-09        | Master Sewers      | 10               |
| 11      | 2024-04-14        | Premier Sewers     | 11               |
| 12      | 2024-04-12        | Master Sewers      | 12               |
| 13      | 2024-04-06        | Master Sewers      | 13               |
| 14      | 2024-04-08        | Master Sewers      | 14               |
| 15      | 2024-04-09        | Master Sewers      | 15               |
| 16      | 2024-05-07        | Advanced Sewers    | 16               |
| 17      | 2024-04-22        | Skilled Sewers     | 17               |
| 18      | 2024-04-21        | Skilled Sewers     | 18               |
| 19      | 2024-04-23        | Skilled Sewers     | 19               |
| 20      | 2024-05-07        | Advanced Sewers    | 20               |
| 21      | 2024-04-12        | Advanced Sewers    | 21               |
| 22      | 2024-04-22        | Advanced Sewers    | 22               |
| 23      | 2024-05-01        | Skilled Sewers     | 23               |
| 24      | 2024-05-20        | Master Sewers      | 24               |
| 26      | 2024-05-15        | Premier Sewers     | 26               |
| 27      | 2024-05-15        | Skilled Sewers     | 27               |
| 28      | 2024-05-28        | Skilled Sewers     | 28               |
| 29      | 2024-05-19        | Skilled Sewers     | 29               |
| 30      | 2024-05-15        | Master Sewers      | 30               |

These tasks are on track to be completed before the end of May 2024. Keep up the great work, team! 🎉

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.end_time < '2024-05-31';
steps.description: Retrieve sewing tasks that have an end time before May 31, 2024
